Enum MailClenaParameterParser.MailClenaCommandLineOptions

Enclosing class:
MailClenaParameterParser
static enum MailClenaParameterParser.MailClenaCommandLineOptions extends Enum<MailClenaParameterParser.MailClenaCommandLineOptions>
Available command-line options to set MailClena's configuration parameters.
